claims.object: A framework to empirically extract and quantify the relationships between building energy use and the spatial proximity of multiple surrounding urban systems
empirically extract the relationships between building energy use and the spatial proximity of multiple surrounding urban systems
quantify the relationships between building energy use and the spatial proximity of multiple surrounding urban systems

surface_layer.definition: A novel framework to analyze urban energy use considering contextual spatial data.

deep_layer.mechanism: CUE-A likely uses statistical or machine learning techniques to correlate building energy consumption with various urban features.
deep_layer.origin: Motivated by the availability of urban data and the need for better energy management.
